div.p: STAFFORD, the County town of Staffordſhire, in W. Long. 2. 0. N. Lat. 53. 0. It ſtands on the river Sow, has two-pariſh churches, a fine ſquare market-place, and a flourihing cloth-manufacture. It sends two members to parliament, and is 135 miles from London. .
